availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Virgil S. Bledsoe (Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Carroll County, Kentucky, native. Son of Edward D. Bledsoe and Emaline Bledsoe. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, District No. 1, p. 26.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 1, p. 177B.
Find A Grave, "Virgil S. Bledsoe (1839-1877)," Memorial #29850205, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29850205 (accessed June 3, 2019).
